description: The combination of pears and mojitos into one cocktail drink is one of the most magical combinations ever. The classic taste of many’s all-time favorite alcoholic drink,&nbsp;mojitos, is enhanced even more by pear’s simple, mildly sweet flavor.
name: Pear Mojito
